content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="f of x equals, cosine x, minus, cosecant x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>csc</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="f prime of 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f prime of 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is undefined.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
